about_the_game:
Game Description

Step into the role of a dashing and charismatic hero on a quest to rid the world of strange and mysterious anomalies. Along the way, you'll encounter enemy waifus - battle them with your firepower, or charm them with amorous and playful banter to lower their guard. Make them fall for you to gain the upper-hand and increase your odds of winning. Capture and summon them for added fire support. The better your flirt game, the stronger your advantage in this fast-paced, voice-powered shoot-'em-up! Use your voice in "Vocal mode" (mic enabled) to unleash powerful attacks, or stick to "Keypad mode" for more conventional controls.

Game Features:

1. Incorporates both overlap and one-hit damage.

2. Almost everything can be destroyed, including enemy bullets and barriers.

3. Flirt, charm and romance your way to lower difficulty when fighting enemy waifus.

4. Engage with over 10 different waifus, each with unique characters and personalities (and deres). Their infatuation, or hatred towards you will determine the combat difficulty.

5. Defeat, capture and convert enemy waifus and summon them for added firepower.

6. Gain experience from destroying enemies and rise in rank to receive random cards for permanent upgrade or temporary bonuses.

7. Dual mode (choose between mic vs keypad/keyboard) to generate sustained attack and firepower.

8. In Vocal mode, player generates bullets by sustained vocalization. This involves holding continuous vocalization into the mic as long as the player can muster.

9. In Keypad/Keyboard mode, bullets are generated by depleting "Breath", which is rapidly replenished when player ceases to attack.

10. WARNING! This is not your conventional style of shmup.

Your voice is your weapon, so take a deep breath and blast away.
